data.title: Meeting new people based on location and activities
data.text: Don't waste your time and never a dull moment. See what people plan to do in your area and simply show that you are interested to participate. Or let others react to your planned activities and, if you want, hook up.
data.subTitle1: Meet new people, wherever you are
data.subTitle3: Getting to know new people by partying, sports, or whatever
